summary: This is a criminal history record (rap sheet) for an individual, produced by the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services in response to an FBI/III request. The document indicates the record may contain additional sentencing information from Florida and includes standard caveats about expunged or sealed data.

persons.name: Michael C. Green
persons.role: Executive Deputy Commissioner of the NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services
persons.context: Listed as the executive deputy commissioner of the agency producing the criminal history record in response to the FBI request.

events.title: Criminal History Record Request and Production
events.description: The New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services produces a criminal history record (rap sheet) in response to an FBI/III request, noting that additional sentencing information may be available from the originating agency in Florida.

locations: Alfred E. Smith Building, 80 South Swan St., Albany, New York 12210
keyFacts: This document is a criminal history record (rap sheet) for an individual, produced on October 6, 2021.
The record was produced by the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services in response to an FBI/III request.
The document notes that 'ADDITIONAL SENTENCING INFORMATION MAY BE AVAILABLE FROM ORIGINATING AGENCY' and references the 'State of Florida'.
The record contains standard legal caveats, including that information may be expunged or sealed and should only be used for authorized purposes.
The document is labeled as a 'single-source offender record'.
